background_description: An aquarium environment with a sandy seabed composed of various sized gravel and pebbles. Several mossy or algae-covered rocks are scattered across the bottom, with some reddish-brown branched structures visible in the upper background. The water is clear.
explanation: The image features a prominent Silver Moony (Monodactylus argenteus) fish. Its pale silver-blue body with subtle vertical stripes is clearly visible against the darker rocks and mixed-color gravel, indicating no camouflage.
